[00:00.00]Joanne (Where Do You Think You're Goin'?) (Piano Version) - Lady Gaga
[00:00.47]Written by：Mark Ronson/Lady Gaga
[00:00.94]Take my hand stay Joanne
[00:08.68]
[00:09.68]Heaven's not ready for you
[00:19.32]
[00:22.84]Every part of my aching heart
[00:30.73]
[00:31.35]Needs you more than the angels do
[00:43.32]
[00:44.32]Girl where do you think you're goin'
[00:50.00]
[00:50.64]Where do you think you're goin' goin' girl
[00:57.51]
[01:01.12]Girl where do you think you're goin'
[01:07.39]Where do you think you're goin' goin' girl
[01:14.22]
[01:30.96]If you could I know that you'd stay
[01:38.13]
[01:39.28]We both know things don't work that way
[01:51.52]
[01:52.21]I promised I wouldn't say goodbye
[02:00.33]
[02:01.47]So I grin and my voice gets thin
[02:12.96]
[02:14.53]Girl where do you think you're goin'
[02:20.91]Where do you think you're goin' goin' girl
[02:27.47]
[02:31.00]Girl where do you think you're goin'
[02:37.16]Where do you think you're goin' goin' girl
[02:43.61]
[02:48.50]Honestly I know where you're goin'
[02:52.39]
[02:56.16]And baby you're just movin' on
[03:01.03]
[03:04.19]And I'll still love you even if I can't see you anymore
[03:14.57]
[03:15.37]Can't wait to see you soar
[03:18.93]
[03:38.15]Girl where do you think you're goin'
[03:44.09]Where do you think you're goin' goin' girl
[03:51.70]
[03:54.19]Girl where do you think you're goin'
[03:59.42]
[04:00.14]Where do you think you're goin' goin' girl
[04:08.89]Call me Joanne
[04:10.80]
[04:17.12]Xo Joanne
[04:18.99]
[04:24.30]Xo xo Joanne

[00:00.94]牵起我的手 留在我身边 乔安妮
[00:08.68]

[00:19.32]
[00:22.84]我那颗疼痛难忍的心
[00:30.73]
[00:31.35]每一处都在叫嚣着 我比天使更加需要你
[00:43.32]
